import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import { Avatar } from "antd"; import { logout } from "../../actions/authAction"; const Dashboard = ({ auth, logout }) => { const [search, setSearch] = useState(""); const location = useLocation(); useEffect(() => { activeNav(); }, [location.pathname]); const activeNav = () => { const pathname = location.pathname; const possibleRoutes = [ { route: "/dashboard", targetId: "home" }, { route: "/dashboard/addproduct", targetId: "AddProduct" }, { route: "/dashboard/product", targetId: "product" }, ]; possibleRoutes.forEach(({ route, targetId }) => { const element = document.getElementById(targetId); if (element) { element.classList.remove("active"); } if (route === pathname) { if (element) { element.classList.add("active"); } } }); }; const avatarText = (name) => { return name .split(" ") .map((n) => n[0]) .join(""); }; const loguserout = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); logout(); }; const { user } = auth; return (

); }; Dashboard.propTypes = { auth: PropTypes.object.isRequired, logout: PropTypes.func.isRequired, }; const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ auth: state.auth, }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, { logout })(Dashboard);
